verses.name: Genesis 41:22
verses.text: And I saw in my dream, and, behold, seven ears came up in one stalk, full and good:

verses.name: Genesis 41:23
verses.text: And, behold, seven ears, withered, thin, and blasted with the east wind, sprung up after them:

verses.name: Genesis 41:24
verses.text: And the thin ears devoured the seven good ears: and I told this unto the magicians; but there was none that could declare it to me.

verses.name: Genesis 41:25
verses.text: And Joseph said unto Pharaoh, The dream of Pharaoh is one: God hath shewed Pharaoh what he is about to do.

verses.name: Genesis 41:26
verses.text: The seven good kine are seven years; and the seven good ears are seven years: the dream is one.
